title: Steelers issues, NFC Wild Card Fallout (Football 12/12)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason La Canfora to break down the Steelers perilous situation and the fallout from the wild card situation in the NFC depending on who makes the playoffs, not to mention the Vikings firing their offensive coordinator.
